readme.title: IC-Light is a project to manipulate the illumination of images.
readme.author: Lvmin Zhang (Lyumin Zhang)
readme.description: The name 'IC-Light' stands for 'Imposing Consistent Light' (we will briefly describe this at the end of this page). Currently, we release two types of models: text-conditioned relighting model and background-conditioned model. Both types take foreground images as inputs.
